content: Good stuff. I was liberal with my highlighter this morning. Food for thought, or maybe another article? How to figure out that list of 5–10 blogs/authors to read. I want to do this, but I am not sure who I’d put on this list (besides you, ha ha.) Is there something like Blinkist for blogs? Medium does this for me somewhat, but it’s still a lot to wade through. — One other note: I use Office 365 because I like to work offline too (plus, I’m a little old school — I’m used to Office). But Google Docs also works well. Google Docs can be set up for offline writing as well. https://support.google.com/docs/answer/6388102?co=GENIE.Platform%3DDesktop&hl=en
